text: govitæna (elu, bætalu, gava, otuvan væni) satun adiya allah utpadanaya kala dæyen ek kotasak tamange kæmættata anuva sandahan kara, meya allahta yayida, (tavat kotasak) meya apage devivarunta yayida pavasannaha. ovun tamange devivarunta yayi sandahan kala kotasin kisivak allahta at vanne næta. ehet allahta yayi sandahan kala dæya (honda dæyak vasayen tibunahot) ovunge devivaruntama at vanneya! ovun karana mema tiranaya itamat napuruya
